title: Death of a Dapper Snowman
description: “A great cozy murder mystery with clever clues, plus plenty of fun characters to make you smile!”  First book in a new series!  Gift shop owner Stormy Day is settling into her new life until she comes across a frozen body, hidden inside a well-dressed snowman.  When her own father is implicated in the murder, Stormy must chase down clues and uncover the town's secrets herself.  As she draws closer to identifying the killer, Stormy's own life may be in danger. That is unless Jeffrey, the mischievous Russian Blue cat who led her to the icy body in the first place, can flick his sleek gray tail at the final piece in the puzzle.
author: Angela Pepper
